thread.section_title: ToursByLocals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ToursByLocals | www.toursbylocals.com
thread.title: Dorothy

author: Dorothy
title: Dorothy
text: David is the BEST personality ++++. Our tour was top notch from start to finish. David was born in St. Thomas so his knowledge of the Island is interesting from start to finish. He stops for pictures, takes your pictures, his knowledge is endless. Made our day in St. Thomas a memorable one, went above and beyond. Do not hesitate to book a tour with David he is extremely good at what he does you will enjoy your tour tremendously.
